I usually wear a medium in shirts but I ordered a large in this green Milano shirt because I wanted it to fit a little loose. It is very cute and color is accurate also the material seems good too . However the large does seem more like a small. It was pretty tight for me upsizing a size. Of course they don’t have any bigger sizes so unfortunately I have to return it .
very soft! Runs a bit small but super cute and good quality!

I got the largest they had but it barely fits. this shirt is for very small girls only and wont fit with bigger titties 😭😭😭 Even if my chest was smaller the shirt still wouldn't have fit, like its that small, and I am not large at all

This is my all time favorite baby tee, when you first get it the material feels a little Jersey like, but after a wash it’s super soft. I will be purchasing more like this. Great quality tee, super cute and comfortable

评论概述: super cute, runs tad bit small
评论详情: Really cute crop top, quality is not terrible for the price but could be a bit better .. Color is just as seen in the photos. I’m a true medium and this was slightly on the smaller side but I can make it work. If you are closer to M/L definitely size up. Overall great and would order again!
Comfy but pretty tight on the neckline. I usually wear a small/medium and ended up getting a large size instead.

评论概述: Super cute, but the sleeves are tight?
评论详情: I can’t stand a tight band and the sleeves have that. The rest fits great and my arms are not abnormally sized. They stretch after a couple hours but it’s annoying so I wouldn’t purchase if you can’t deal.

When I move my arms the fabric on the back of the neck lifts, the color is different than pictured, and the sleeves are also different than pictured. The fabric is swimsuit type material and makes the shirt look metallicy and it is just not what I had hoped for. I gave it 3 stars because it is still cute enough to wear, just not all it was cracked up to be in the photos.

The shirt is high quality, the color is a nice deep dark green accompanied by a bright bold yellow/gold embroidered lettering. The shirt is velvety soft and it sits comfortably just below my chest, giving it the cropped look/effect. Paired with some baggy cargo jeans these make a for a great outfit selection . 👍🏾

The design of the skulls is pretty cool and nice. The material of the shirt is terrible. It’s that SHEIN material. I don’t know what I expected but I just thought I’d give it a try. It also runs too big. Looks like an M for boys, not an M for girls. If you don’t care about the quality and still want to get it, size down.

评论概述: Cute crop top, but could be better quality
评论详情: I recently bought this dark green crop top that says "Milano" and I think it's really cute and comfy! However, I do have to say that the quality of the fabric is not the best. It's a bit cheapy and feels like it might not hold up super well in the wash. Despite this, I still really like wearing it and it makes me feel cute and happy when I do! Overall, if you're looking for a fun and trendy crop top, this is a great option, but just be aware that it might not last forever.
I always get compliments in this, I love the stretchyness. It’s very flattering

This has to be my new favorite casual shirt! The colors are really deep and rich it actually makes the tee look expensive. The fit is also PERFECT. It’s cut perfectly, it sits perfectly, and I don’t have to wear a bra with it so what could be better than that lol. The material is really soft & comfortable. It also has a good amount of stretch which surprised me so if you’re debating on this top DON’T just get it!
